product_name: Ultimate Survival Technologies Paracord 325 Utility Cord - 50'
long_description: Useful for lashing gear, hanging food bags and replacing shoelaces or tent guylines, you won't regret bringing the Ultimate Survival Technologies Paracord 325 Utility Cord with you on the trail. Includes 50 ft. of 325-lb. test nylon cord. Tease out individual threads to use as fishing line or sewing thread. Ultimate Survival Technologies Paracord 325 Utility Cord includes a carabiner for easy pack attachment.
short_description: Useful for lashing gear, hanging food bags and replacing shoelaces or tent guylines, you won't regret bringing the Ultimate Survival Technologies Paracord 325 Utility Cord with you on the trail.
